item.title: FAQ
item.description: Frequently Asked Questions Why the new structure? Why split the SIG Lead Role into 2 distinct roles? While developing the SIG governance requirements, 3 distinct sets of responsibilities were identified: Setting technical direction and resolving technical discussions in subprojects of a SIG (e.g. intra-subproject escalation point) Setting pure-technical scope across the SIG and resolving technical discussions that span subprojects (e.g. inter-subproject escalation point) Managing the operational aspects of the SIG - defining and evolving process and structure.
